TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: In this we are creating source for mapping info table. also we are calculating max of w_ev_hs_id to put it in mapping info table.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: AGG_MAPPING_INFO

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: In this we are selecting all the required columns from WORKITEM_EVENT_HISTORY table and applied incremental logic as well.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_WORKITEM_EVENT_HISTORY

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT 'WEH' AS SOURCE_NAME, W.WORKITEM_ID, S.STATUS, W.EVENT_DATE, WE.EVENT, T.TASK_NAME, L.LOCATION_NAME, W.LOGIN_ID, null as REASON_BRIDGE_CODE, W.WI_EVENT_HISTORY_ID from ( select WI_EVENT_HISTORY_ID, WORKITEM_ID, EVENT_ID, EVENT_DATE, TASK_ID, LOGIN_ID, LAST_UPDATED, BUNDLE_ID from WORKITEM_EVENT_HISTORY) W join WORKITEM_EVENT WE on WE.EVENT_ID=W.EVENT_ID join TASK T on T.TASK_ID=W.TASK_ID join USER_INFO U on U.LOGIN_ID=W.LOGIN_ID join location L on L.LOCATION_ID=U.LOCATION_ID join STATUS S on S.STATUS_ID=WE.STATUS_ID where W.WI_EVENT_HISTORY_ID>'$$wi_id'

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: In this we have created batchnum and timestamp ports.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_BAT_TS

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: In this we are getting existing values stored in mapping_info table with joining parameter name.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_MAPPING_INFO

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: In this we created condition for flag which may return 0,1,3 on the basis of condition.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_flag
